title: Why do you get leaverbuster for leaving a bot game?
body: Are bot games not ment for learning and testing things? why is it that i have to struggle with lag till its over before i can try and fix it? why is it that i have to sit there for 15-30 minutes hoping i don't get afk cause i have fps 00? its not right, bot games are ment to test things out, if i have to try and fix my game i go to a bot game, so i don't f!@# over actual players in a real game. so why do we get leaverbuster if we have to leave a bot game? nobody plans to leave but if it happens at least its a bot game............ so why do we have to wait 20 minutes?

replies.body: Not everyone likes pvp modes, and there are quite a few players who prefer AI Vs. Coop.  There are still other players out there you're leaving behind and that causes a negative experience for them.  You can stick to custom games or the practice tool for testing and learning, though.
If it's a bot custom game, you can leave. It has the LeaverBuster warning, but nothing actually happens.
